reasoning: The test was looking for a 'File Type Filtering' feature with 'Filter Options' UI that does not exist in the product. The code review confirms no such functionality is implemented - this is not a missing/broken feature, but a test specification for functionality that was never built.
evidence_summary: Screenshots show a fully functional Assets interface with Sort dropdown (Last Modified/Date Uploaded/Alphabetical) and Search box, but no 'Filter Options' UI exists anywhere. The application is working correctly; the tested feature simply does not exist in this product.
scenario_id: Evoq.PersonaBar.Assets::File Type Filtering::Locate File Type Filtering UI
